entries.content: Objections are not rejections but opportunities to provide information.
entries.notes: Implied through handling objections as part of the conversation process

entries.content: When faced with skepticism ('you're probably going to tell me you don't experience any of that'), the agent acknowledges it without resistance, keeping the conversation open.
If you want to hang up you can or we can keep talking after... would that be fair?
entries.notes: Phrase used to disarm objections by giving control to the prospect

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
